text: Tara katha sune sulayamana mucaki hasalena ebam balalena, he amara palanakarta, tumi amake samartha?2470;A'o yate ami tomara se'i niyamatera krtajnata prakasa karate pari, ya tumi amake o amara pita-matake dana karecha ebam yate ami tomara pachandaniya satkarma karate pari ebam amake nija anugrahe tomara satkarmaparayana bandadera antarbhukta kara.
